meaningMnemonic: The kanji and the word are exactly the same. That means they share meanings as well.
readingMnemonic:
This word uses the kun'yomi reading, which you haven't learned yet, so here's a mnemonic to help you:

You are <vocabulary>stylish</vocabulary>. Since you're stylish, you avoid <reading>icky</reading> (いき) clothing at all costs. You won't even be seen in the same room, that's how stylish you are.
